name: Adherent of Hope
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control a Basri planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on Adherent of Hope.
flavor_text: "Basri has shown me the way forward, and I will follow."

name: Alchemist's Gift
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains your choice of deathtouch or lifelink until end of turn. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it. Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

name: Alpine Watchdog
oracle_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor_text:
"On the eighth day, a blizzard hit. Supplies were lost, and morale plummeted. On the ninth day, Dover found us."
—*To the Summit: A Tale of Survival*

name: Anointed Chorister
oracle_text:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
{4}{W}: Anointed Chorister gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I sing of benevolence and mercy, of golden wings bringing comfort to the meek and downtrodden."

name: Basri's Acolyte
oracle_text:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
When Basri's Acolyte enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures you control.
flavor_text: Basri carries on his god's legacy, spreading her teachings throughout the Multiverse.

name: Bloodfell Caves
oracle_text:
Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield tapped.
When Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

name: Blood Glutton
oracle_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: "Some savor the hunt. I savor the kill."

name: Blossoming Sands
oracle_text:
Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield tapped.
When Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

name: Bone Pit Brute
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Bone Pit Brute enters the battlefield, target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Welcome to the club.

name: Burn Bright
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"From a great bonfire at the dawn of time, the first Gruul kindled their rage. The same flame burns in you."
—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

name: Caged Zombie
oracle_text: {1}{B}, {T}: Each opponent loses 2 life. Activate only if a creature died this turn.
flavor_text: "Six consecutive life sentences" takes on a new meaning when necromancy is involved.

name: Cancel
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
flavor_text: "I decide what stands in my way."

name: Capture Sphere
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
When Capture Sphere enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Celestial Enforcer
oracle_text: {1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature. Activate only if you control a creature with flying.
flavor_text: "I look to the heavens for hope, but you will kneel."

name: Chandra's Magmutt
oracle_text: {T}: Chandra's Magmutt deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text:
"Is it purebred? No, but it's pure fire."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Colossal Dreadmaw
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text: If you feel the ground quake, run. If you hear its bellow, flee. If you see its teeth, it's too late.

name: Concordia Pegasus
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: In the cloudy skies and dim light of autumn, a flash of white wings is a reminder that better times lie ahead.

name: Crash Through
oracle_text:
Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Draw a card.

name: Crypt Lurker
oracle_text: When Crypt Lurker enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature or discard a creature card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Even the rats refuse to set foot inside. I fear to think what might be waiting in there."
—Gravedigger's journal

name: Daybreak Charger
oracle_text: When Daybreak Charger enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: It's often mistaken for the coming dawn as it gallops across the horizon.

name: Deathbloom Thallid
oracle_text: When Deathbloom Thallid dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor_text:
"Nature is not always gentle or kind, but all life begets life."
—Marwyn of Llanowar

name: Defiant Strike
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "My family was saved thanks to a single Boros soldier. It's why I joined the Legion. I will be the protector now."

name: Destructive Tampering
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"I don't think they'll appreciate my . . . adjustments."
—Karavin, renegade saboteur

name: Dismal Backwater
oracle_text:
Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield tapped.
When Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

name: Drowsing Tyrannodon
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
As long as you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Drowsing Tyrannodon can attack as though it didn't have defender.
flavor_text: What the rangers thought were warning growls turned out to be nothing but monstrous snoring.

name: Dub
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has first strike, and is a Knight in addition to its other types. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: "Rise, knight of New Benalia."

name: Duress
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text: Resistance is unthinkable.

name: Feat of Resistance
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.)

name: Fetid Imp
oracle_text:
Flying
{B}: Fetid Imp gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

name: Finishing Blow
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text: "In this world, it's kill or be killed. I'd rather not be the latter."

name: Forgotten Sentinel
oracle_text: Forgotten Sentinel enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: It was built to withstand the ages, but no one remembers who built it or why it keeps its eternal watch.

name: Frantic Inventory
oracle_text: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Frantic Inventory in your graveyard.
flavor_text: "Another village, another angry mob. Why do I even bother unpacking?"

name: Frost Breath
oracle_text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: "I'll make ice chimes of your bones."

name: Furor of the Bitten
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text: Those who only believe themselves infected with lycanthropy can be as dangerous as those who really are.

name: Gale Swooper
oracle_text:
Flying
When Gale Swooper enters the battlefield, target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Be glad the griffin set you back on your feet when it was done with you. My goat wasn't so lucky."
—Arram, goatherd

name: Garruk's Gorehorn
flavor_text:
"It certainly takes after its master: big and brutish, and you can smell it from a mile away."
—Liliana Vess

name: Gloom Sower
oracle_text: Whenever Gloom Sower becomes blocked by a creature, that creature's controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"First, the darkness fell. Terror came next. After that, only despair remained."
—*The Tragedy of Morein*

name: Gnarled Sage
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
As long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn, Gnarled Sage gets +0/+2 and has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)

name: Goblin Arsonist
oracle_text: When Goblin Arsonist dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: With great power comes great risk of getting yourself killed.

name: Goblin Wizardry
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin Wizard creature tokens with prowess. (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, they get +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: "Quiet in the library" soon gave way to larger concerns.

name: Grasp of Darkness
oracle_text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I welcome the use of even the foulest magic if it will rid us of the monstrosities that plague our world."
—Munda, ambush leader

name: Hobblefiend
oracle_text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
{1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Hobblefiend.
flavor_text: Bedbugs aren't the only things you need to worry about biting you at night.

name: Hunter's Edge
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
flavor_text: The hunt ends. Lunch begins.

name: Igneous Cur
oracle_text: {1}{R}: Igneous Cur gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Some dogs just aren't meant to be indoor pets.

name: Infernal Scarring
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has "When this creature dies, draw a card."
flavor_text: One who is marked by a demon in life is sure to be remembered as one in death.

name: Jungle Hollow
oracle_text:
Jungle Hollow enters the battlefield tapped.
When Jungle Hollow enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

name: Keen Glidemaster
oracle_text: {2}{U}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Fear is a rational response, but waiting won't make it any easier. Just jump!"

name: Legion's Judgment
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
flavor_text: "My lance was once wielded by Venerable Tarrian. In his name and by his might, I cast you down!"

name: Library Larcenist
oracle_text: Whenever Library Larcenist attacks, draw a card.
flavor_text: "I specialize in missing manuscripts, pilfered poetry, and lifted letters."

name: Life Goes On
oracle_text: You gain 4 life. If a creature died this turn, you gain 8 life instead.
flavor_text:
"If you believe the God-Pharaoh tests you, charge with me to prove yourself. If you believe he betrayed us all, join with me to fight for tomorrow!"
—Samut, former Tah-crop initiate

name: Liliana's Steward
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Liliana's Steward: Target opponent discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: Servants at Vess Manor are chosen for their strong work ethic and respectful demeanor. Being alive is not required.

name: Llanowar Visionary
oracle_text:
When Llanowar Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: The elves of Llanowar look to their past to determine the shape of their future.

name: Lofty Denial
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. If you control a creature with flying, counter that spell unless its controller pays {4} instead.
flavor_text: The mage scowled as yet another bolt splashed harmlessly against seemingly empty air.

name: Makeshift Battalion
oracle_text: Battalion — Whenever Makeshift Battalion and at least two other creatures attack, put a +1/+1 counter on Makeshift Battalion.
flavor_text: Their ranks are thin, their formation is improvised, their weapons are borrowed, and you'd best get out of their way.

name: Masked Blackguard
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
{2}{B}: Masked Blackguard gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Her footsteps are whispers, her passage a last breath.

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text: Many an inventor has collapsed under the pressure to create a flawless design.

name: Mistral Singer
oracle_text:
Flying
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: "I sang of storms, there came a squall. I sang of waves, the seas grew tall. I sang of love, but no voice called."

name: Mystic Skyfish
oracle_text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, Mystic Skyfish gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: The problem wasn't that fish had learned how to fly. It was that sharks had adapted to follow them.

name: Onakke Ogre
flavor_text: The ogres you know are nothing like the Onakke. Possessing both intellect and industry, they had brute strength without being brutish.

name: Opt
oracle_text:
Scry 1.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The crystal pulsed with the power of Teferi's Planeswalker spark. Had Jhoira given him a blessing or a curse?

name: Ornery Dilophosaur
oracle_text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Whenever Ornery Dilophosaur attacks, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Ornery Dilophosaur gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Pitchburn Devils
oracle_text: When Pitchburn Devils dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The ingenuity of goblins, the depravity of demons, and the smarts of sheep.

name: Portcullis Vine
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature with defender: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Nature's way of saying "take the long way home."

name: Pridemalkin
oracle_text:
When Pridemalkin enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample. (They can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker they're attacking.)

name: Prismite
oracle_text: {2}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: Even its shadow is a dazzling rainbow.

name: Radiant Fountain
oracle_text:
When Radiant Fountain enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
{T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text:
"All peoples treasure a place where the weary traveler may drink in peace."
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Rambunctious Mutt
oracle_text: When Rambunctious Mutt enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.
flavor_text: Emphatic words with powerful gestures. Clearly this was playtime.

name: Ranger's Guile
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text:
"You don't survive in the wild by standing in plain sight."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Read the Tides
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Draw three cards.
• Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.
flavor_text: Charts and instruments work fine, but the best navigators aren't above a spell or two to nudge the tides in a more favorable direction.

name: Return to Nature
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Yes, nature is stronger. You don't see little buildings sprouting on trees."
—Emmara

name: Revitalize
oracle_text:
You gain 3 life.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"A potion is no substitute for a skilled surgeon, but it will hold your bits in."
—Torricks, battlefield medic

name: Rise Again
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"I love those who are eager to serve."
—Liliana Vess

name: Roaming Ghostlight
oracle_text:
Flying
When Roaming Ghostlight enters the battlefield, return up to one target non-Spirit creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Some who die senseless deaths return as formless spirits, seeking answers where there are none.

name: Rookie Mistake
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +0/+2 and another target creature gets -2/-0.
flavor_text: "Stop locking your knees as you strike! Now stand up and try again."

name: Rousing Read
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Rousing Read enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then discard a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.
flavor_text: Great literature can transport the reader.

name: Rugged Highlands
oracle_text:
Rugged Highlands enters the battlefield tapped.
When Rugged Highlands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

name: Run Afoul
oracle_text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"What did you catch today, my pet? Ah, it looks like a bit of vampire stuck between your teeth."
—Atla Palani, nest tender

name: Sabertooth Mauler
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Sabertooth Mauler and untap it.
flavor_text:
"I hope the idiot who introduced these creatures to the jungle was their first meal."
—Opar, veteran guide

name: Sanguine Indulgence
oracle_text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if you've gained 3 or more life this turn.
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"Drink from the vein? How provincial."
—Lord Duchorvin

name: Scorching Dragonfire
oracle_text: Scorching Dragonfire deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If that creature or planeswalker would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text: As the blaze raced toward her, Syr Ameril closed her eyes and pictured Castle Ardenvale so her last thoughts would be of home.

name: Scoured Barrens
oracle_text:
Scoured Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.
When Scoured Barrens enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

name: Secure the Scene
oracle_text: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
flavor_text:
"You know it's a great show when the Azorius arrest the props, too!"
—Judith, the Scourge Diva

name: Setessan Training
oracle_text:
Enchant creature you control
When Setessan Training enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

name: Shock
oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"The beauty of it is they never see it coming. Ever."
—Razzix, sparkmage

name: Short Sword
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text:
"Sometimes the only difference between a martyr and a hero is a sword."
—Captain Sisay, *Memoirs*

name: Silent Dart
oracle_text: {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Silent Dart: It deals 3 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: "These terms are acceptable to House Dimir. Shall we shake on it?"

name: Skeleton Archer
oracle_text: When Skeleton Archer enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"Soul, flesh, even eyes—none of these are strictly necessary for deadly precision."
—Modriss of Zargoth Fen

name: Skyscanner
oracle_text:
Flying
When Skyscanner enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: The municipal senate makes extensive use of the thopters, mostly to gather dirt on rival senators.

name: Snarespinner
oracle_text:
Reach
Whenever Snarespinner blocks a creature with flying, Snarespinner gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Let's lure the drakes to the webs over the Samok Stand. Keep the spiders content."
—Aurelia

name: Spellgorger Weird
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Spellgorger Weird.
flavor_text: Freed from their respective labs, the two weirds formed a partnership, feeding on the arcane energies of war.

name: Spined Megalodon
oracle_text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Whenever Spined Megalodon attacks, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Spirit of Malevolence
oracle_text: When Spirit of Malevolence dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Great evil weighs on the soul.

name: Staunch Shieldmate
flavor_text: "Gilded with gold from a dragon's trove, it is! And etched with the image of the dragon I slew to take it."

name: Storm Caller
oracle_text: When Storm Caller enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: He became elder shaman when his predecessor was mysteriously struck by lightning on a cloudless day.

name: Sure Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: To survive imminent doom, it sometimes takes a foolhardy soul who acts first and fears later.

name: Swift Response
oracle_text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor_text:
"There's nothing quite as satisfying as delivering a good kick to the face."
—Adrasteia, Akroan captain

name: Swiftwater Cliffs
oracle_text:
Swiftwater Cliffs enters the battlefield tapped.
When Swiftwater Cliffs enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.

name: Teferi's Protege
oracle_text: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: Teferi's legacy lives on in Tolaria through the study of time magic and a tradition of irrepressible mischief.

name: Thornwood Falls
oracle_text:
Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield tapped.
When Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

name: Thrill of Possibility
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: "Right now, in these first moments of creation, it is simultaneously nothing and everything."

name: Titanic Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The massive dominate through might. The tiny survive with guile. Beware the tiny who become massive.

name: Tome Anima
oracle_text: Tome Anima can't be blocked as long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn.
flavor_text: Sometimes knowledge takes on a life of its own.

name: Track Down
oracle_text: Scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature or land card, draw a card. (To scry 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor_text: Scents fade and footprints wash away, but some trails can never be erased.

name: Tranquil Cove
oracle_text:
Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield tapped.
When Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

name: Trufflesnout
oracle_text:
When Trufflesnout enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Trufflesnout.
• You gain 4 life.
flavor_text: Its exploits are the stuff of legends among local chefs and fuel for nightmares among the forest thallids.

name: Turn to Slag
oracle_text: Turn to Slag deals 5 damage to target creature. Destroy all Equipment attached to that creature.
flavor_text:
"If it wasn't a blackened, stinking, melted abomination before, it certainly is now."
—Koth of the Hammer

name: Turret Ogre
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
When Turret Ogre enters the battlefield, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, Turret Ogre deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: Common Gruul career aspirations: berserker, shaman, catapult.

name: Valorous Steed
oracle_text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
When Valorous Steed enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
flavor_text: A unicorn chooses only the most virtuous and noble of knights to be its companion.

name: Village Rites
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: "You were so eager to take and consume. Yet when asked to give, you refuse?"

name: Vodalian Arcanist
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell.
flavor_text: The Vodalian Empire tends to be insular. The scholarly Volshe caste are the exception, using education as an antidote to xenophobia.

name: Walking Corpse
flavor_text:
"Feeding a normal army is a problem of logistics. With zombies, it is an asset. Feeding is why they fight. Feeding is why they are feared."
—Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

name: Wall of Runes
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Wall of Runes enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Warded Battlements
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.
flavor_text: In dire times, even a place of refuge can become a weapon of war.

name: Wildwood Patrol
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text: If you're lucky, the centaurs will give a single warning to leave their territory before driving a spear into you. If you're unlucky, the spear is the warning.

name: Wind-Scarred Crag
oracle_text:
Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield tapped.
When Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

name: Wishcoin Crab
flavor_text:
"What wishes do they grant? Mostly pinching-related ones."
—Omik, superintendent of waterworks
